sentences.en: Administer the salve to the sunburned area with a cotton swab.
sentences.cn: 请用棉药签把药膏敷在晒伤的地方.

sentences.en: Administer this draught, therefore, with thine own hand. "
sentences.cn: 所以, 还是由你亲手给她喂药吧. ”

sentences.en: He thinks the tax is impossible to administer.
I administer the oath to him.
Intravenous infusions are also used to administer medications.
sentences.cn: 静脉输液也可作为一种给药方法.

sentences.en: It takes brains to administer upon a large corporation.
sentences.cn: 管理一家大公司需要智慧.

sentences.en: Our office administers the affairs of the Society.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室管理协会的事务。

sentences.en: Paramedics are trained to administer certain drugs.
sentences.cn: 护理人员们接受了配发某些药物的培训。

sentences.en: The Court will administer the punishment of the criminal by law.
sentences.cn: 法庭将对罪犯绳之以法.

sentences.en: The money will be administered by local charities.
sentences.cn: 这笔资金将由当地慈善机构管理。

sentences.en: They had the right to administer their own internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们有权料理自己的事务.

sentences.en: This unit teaches students how to administer first aid .
sentences.cn: 本单元教学生如何进行急救。

sentences.en: to administer the last rites to sb
We need the best men to administer the affairs of the state.
sentences.cn: 我们需要贤能之人掌理国务.

sentences.en: Whatever we do should administer to the needs of the many, not to those of the few.
sentences.cn: 我们做任何事情都应该为了多数人的需要, 而不是为了少数人的需要.

sentences.en: Whatever we do should administer to the needs of the many.
sentences.cn: 我们做任何事情都应该为了多数人的需要.

words.tran_cn: 管理；行政；实施；行政机构

trans.tran_cn: 治理，管理，实施，给予，施用（药物），给…一脚/拳
trans.tran_en: to manage the work or money of a company or organization

trans.tran_cn: 管理， 掌管， 料理…的事务； 施行， 实施； 给予， 派给
trans.tran_en: to manage the work or money of a company or organization
